comments.body: I'd feel a bit safer here if we also tested something about the time -- that the tz's are different _and_ that the same "time" is given for both.
Indeed. I also added expunge to make sure that we are not getting the Log object from cache. And now it's much nicer to have all asserts in one place.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +75,79 @@            assert log_time == current_time
            assert old_log.dttm.tzinfo.name != 'UTC'
            assert log_time.tzinfo.name == 'UTC'
            assert old_log.dttm.astimezone(pendulum.timezone('UTC')) == log_time
